column1: Jimsonweed is a tall herb plant.

You may receive: - Activated charcoal - Breathing support - Blood and urine tests - Chest x-ray - EKG (electrocardiogram, or heart tracing) - Fluids by IV (through the vein) - Laxatives - Medication to treat symptoms, including an antidote to the effects of the poison - Tube through the mouth into the stomach to wash out the stomach (gastric lavage)
